overall_goal: Stabilize develop after merges, migrate backend to Poetry, align CI and docs, and ensure frontend E2E readiness.

tasks.description: Refactor authentication to package-based structure and update imports.
Update README and docs to reflect Poetry usage and dev port 3001 (replace pip/requirements mentions).
Validate CI (Python 3.12 + Poetry) across workflows; fix any residual issues.
Audit frontend E2E setup (Playwright baseURL, port 3001) and test coverage; propose improvements.
Deduplicate agent docs (choose agents.md as canonical, fold gemini.md content).
